title: Junglers that dont gank even when you are countered and dying underneath your turret.
body:
Literal cancer, heres an idea, if i go 0/2 in the first 5 minutes of the game, maybe look at my lane and think to yourself 'shit why is he dying so much" when i then proceed to die a third time literally underneath my turret because my lane opponent is two hitting me thats the time to say "shit maybe i should step in before this gets out of hand and snowballs into a carry" If you then proceed to watch me die another 5 times all the while bitching about me dying, it stops being my fault because lets face facts, im dying under my only protection what am i supposed to do? afk? thats the only way im not gonna die to this guy, so if you can honestly sit there, and afk farm while bitching about me, then just you know, uninstall, becuase you clearly are missing some chromosomes.

Like i mean, i started asking for ganks after the first death, so he cant even use the bloody "you never asked excuse" any jungler worth his weight in salt is going to gank long before it reaches the point where you die as soon as you enter the lane, thats just common fucking sense.

Edit: For context i was morde vs panth, so his spear depleted my shield easily and zoned me out of the creep wave, and his stun was enough to trap me into death because i cant generate shield while im stunned

replies.body: So what you're saying is you suck so hard at your lane that you want your jungler to come and join the party to feed your lane opponent even more? No thanks, I'll focus on mid and bot to get them ahead because you are already a lost cause.
If you go 0/2 in the first 5 mins you only have yourself to blame. Im guessing you died, tped back, died again and then got denied a big wave. Easiest way to be useless.
It's better to cut you're losses and help other lanes win even harder.
Ok cool, so why did we lose even though they did that? oh right, because my lane opponent isnt shackled to top lane, oopsies.
depends really, because if youre just playing shit and doing stupid stuff im not going to gank you lmao not gonna get that lane opponent even more fed fuck that

at 0/2 they wont get more fed

at 0/5 maybe

But if it reaches that point and you still havnt ganked theres a problem.
A tale of tears and salt.

Mate i know this pain, i just came out of a game where our Vi called jung, but Lee instalocked, and then Vi refused to change position so she locked in as well, so i had to solo bot as Kog'Maw vs Ezreal and Ori (who both had thunderlords and spent the whole time playing the game of who could proc it first on me)
and Lee and Vi were too pre-occuied sitting at the jungle camps waiting for them to spawn instead of coming and ganking me. 
Lee then went AFK for no reason, but by some miracle still we were almost pulling off a win, Kog was entering his hyper carry stage and we had a Zed who was fed to mars and back, when suddenly our jayce is like 'nah fuck you guys I'm out' and just stood at base doing nothing (yet still talking)

i just don't understand some people...
